import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get HashSecret Rotation Status"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/security/secrets/rotate-keys/status"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the status of the current or most recent secret rotation process.

You can learn more about key rotation [here](../../docs/guides/secret-store/basics#secret-key-rotation).

### Tokens
- A valid [`AccessToken`](../../docs/guides/auth/tokens#access-token)
  with [`ADMIN`](../../docs/guides/auth/roles#admins) permissions is required.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
